page.title: 08PENNYHILL PARK,BAGSHOT
page.content:
Pennyhill Park Hotel is an established, exclusive hotel with many historic connections.It has on one of the borders of its 112 acres a {holly hedge}which used to be the {longest in Britain,}but it has since declined.
The house itself is almost 100 years old and so this provides considerable intrigue.
In the grounds are many sports facilities including a swimming pool,tennis courts and a 9 hole golf course. The land used to be rich heathland on which the local villagers built hunting lodges.There is a legend that {Dick Turpin}and his men used to sit on one of the hills and look out for his pursuers.
